comment: This is the Agrilution app sending an invalid update, ignore

Harvest Chilli. This also causes the update below, which bumps AWS version.

This is AWS Shadow accepting a recipe update from Agrilution. It has no ClienToken, so will be ignored by the Mongoose processing, see https://github.com/mongoose-os-libs/aws/blob/2.14.0/src/mgos_aws_shadow.c#L335
